mapper.select: select * from Self_Introduce s left outer join (select s.id, listagg(k.keyword,',') within group(order by sid) as keywords from keyword_selfintroduce k, self_introduce s where k.sid = s.id and s.userid = #{userId} group by s.id) k on s.id = k.id where s.id = #{ id }

select id, userId, question, answer, to_char(applyDate,'yyyy"년"mm"월"dd"일"')applyDate, appliedCompany, to_char(writeDate,'yyyy"년"mm"월"dd"일"') writeDate, , to_char(editDate,'yyyy"년"mm"월"dd"일"') editDate from Self_Introduce where ${type} like '%'||#{window}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into Self_Introduce (id, userId, writeDate) values (#{id}, #{userId}, sysdate)

select keyword_selfintroduce_seq.nextval from dual
insert into keyword_selfintroduce (id, userid, keyword, sid) values(#{id}, #{userId}, #{keyword}, #{sid})
mapper.update: update self_introduce set QUESTION = #{question}, ANSWER = #{answer}, APPLYDATE= to_date(#{applyDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), APPLIEDCOMPANY = #{appliedCompany}, EDITDATE = #{editDate} where id=#{id} and userid = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM KEYWORD_SELFINTRODUCE WHERE sid = #{id} and keyword = #{keyword}
